Water Ward

Bless/Buff: +5 Defence if underwater
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], Use Underwater Only [uwonly])
Many soldiers become surrounded by strong currents, making them very difficult to hit in combat. The spell can only be cast underwater.
